metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3838 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
[Unknown description]

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3838` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-dompdf - 0.6.2+dfsg-3.1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php-dompdf package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6.2+dfsg-3.1ubuntu0.1').
